thread.title: Passengers complain of 'chaos' around trains to Cardiff
thread.title_full: Passengers complain of 'chaos' around trains to Cardiff | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Passengers complain of 'chaos' around trains to Cardiff
text:
Rail passengers have taken to Twitter to express their frustration at delays and overcrowding on train services towards Cardiff this morning.
Thousands of rugby fans are trying to reach the Millennium Stadium ready for the Rugby World Cup game between Ireland and Canada.
Read More: First Great Western apologises for 'severe overcrowding'
Ben Mathewson @bjmathewson Follow @ fgw unbelievably poor service at Bristol parkway, no information, waiting for 40 minutes!Was Rugby World Cup a surprise to you? #incompetent
11:23 - 19 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Tessa Coombes @policytessa Follow Nice one @ fgw trains #Bristol to Cardiff totally crammed, hundreds of @ irishrugby fans left on platform #RWC2015 http://t.co/bFEI38GAvw
11:36 - 19 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Louise @louweeziz Follow It's chaos at Paddington. Nowhere near enough trains or carriages for all the @ rugbyworldcup supporters. Standing room only. V. poor, @ fgw
10:49 - 19 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Beth Garner @bethgarner92 Follow Absolute shambles from @ fgw today. No planning for trains to Cardiff and obvious excess capacity today. #shambles #trains #fgw #rwc2015
11:33 - 19 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Sat 19 Sep 2015 Read more 8 updates First Great Western apologises to rugby fans for train delays Travel Rugby World Cup 2015 Cardiff Wales
